| `placeholder`     | `placeholder`      |                                             | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `preventSelected` | `prevent-selected` | Prevent dropdown self update selected value | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `value`           | `value`            | Selected item value                         | `string`  | `''`        |
